item.subvirus.raziv1.description: Wanted for the total theft of all milk in the city, including milk from NPC fridges,
item.subvirus.raziv1.description2: quest milk, and milk that <never even existed>.
item.subvirus.raziv1.description3: Also suspected of mass castration of all the city's cats.
item.subvirus.raziv1.description4: Cats are furious, residents are hysterical, veterinarians are in hiding.
item.subvirus.raziv2.description: Wanted for brutal abuse of beta testers and programmers in C#,
item.subvirus.raziv2.description2: C++, Python, and Java. Known for psychological torture:
item.subvirus.raziv2.description3: endless bugs, null reference in release, missing documentation,
item.subvirus.raziv2.description4: and a build that <worked on my machine>.
item.subvirus.raziv3.description: Wanted for trading mushrooms and all narcotic products.
item.subvirus.raziv3.description2: Substances cause AI glitches, philosophical monologues, and NPCs leaving the script.
item.subvirus.raziv3.description3: The forest has been declared a danger zone.
item.subvirus.raziv4.description: Wanted for murdering the commander, all comrades, the client,
item.subvirus.raziv4.description2: and a random witness who was just passing by. Also accused
item.subvirus.raziv4.description3: of hacking and robbing bank vaults without entry, tools, or explanations.
item.subvirus.raziv5.description: Wanted for creating ArcLinux both with and without a virus,
item.subvirus.raziv5.description2: and for making trinkets with <harmless> viruses
item.subvirus.raziv5.description3: that accidentally delete the system, steal data, and open 200 terminals.
item.subvirus.raziv6.description: Wanted for participating in robberies with the SubWorld crew,
item.subvirus.raziv6.description2: organizing chaos, sabotaging plans, and the phrase:
item.subvirus.raziv6.description3: <Don't freak out, I've done this before>.
advancement.subvirus.subworld.title: SubWorld
SubWorld
advancement.subvirus.enter_infected.desc: Why is the front door in this world pink and violet?
